content:
Hi all.
Here you are some interesting links:

  • HL7 FHIR Connectathons: https://www.hl7.org/events/fhir-connectathon/index.cfm?ref=nav
  • Virtual 26th HL7 FHIR Connectathon: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021-01+Connectathon+26
  • FAIR track in the Virtual 26th HL7 FHIR Connectathon: https://tinyurl.com/FAIRTrack
  • 'FAIRness for FHIR' project | FHIR4FAIR Implementation Guide: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=91991234

At you disposal if you need more information.
Are the slides available that you just presented?

Dear Ian. Yes, I have just updated the slides used in the FAIR Track Orientation Session on 17th December, in the FAIR track page (https://tinyurl.com/FAIRTrack), in the section 'Track Orientation Details'. We are going to upload the recording too very soon. Thank you very much for the interest. Best.
slide deck and live presentation are now published here
